content: Yes, people do fall for phishing scams despite these tips seeming like common sense. Phishing attacks have become increasingly sophisticated, and scammers are getting better at disguising their emails and websites to look like legitimate ones. In addition, people may be in a rush, not paying attention, or simply unaware of the risks at the time, making them more vulnerable to falling for phishing scams. That's why it's still important to remind people of these tips and encourage them to stay vigilant against phishing attacks.
